ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:24:37 [Issue ID 4000-134385] urn:comicvine:4000-134385 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 17:49:26. [Issue ID 85729]
ComicInfo.Penciller: John Larter,Josh Blaylock,Steve Kurth,Tim Seeley,W.C. Carani
ComicInfo.Summary: G.I. Joe Battle Files is a three issue "who's who" style mini-series focusing on the members of the Joe and Cobra teams, as well as their vehicles. If the success of the G.I. Joe Convention Special is any indication, expect fans to love this book. Issue one focuses on the Joes, issue two on Cobra, and issue three on vehicles and tech gear. Full of information on each character, including updated ranks and bios. This Issue: Atten-hut! It's everything you ever wanted to know about America's elite fighting force as the first issue of Battle Files kicks off with a focus on the Joes themselves. From your old favorites to the new blood, this is an invaluable resource for any G.I. Joe fan.
ComicInfo.Title: The Joes
